document_data.name: Shadalah
document_data.mainbody: Princess '''Shadalah''' was the bride of sheik [[Kassim Arslan]]'s son, [[Hassan Arslan]]. In the year {{yearlink|1356}}, the [[efreeti]] [[Khalitharius]] kidnapped her because of the mark on her palm, caused by [[Martek]]'s magic.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|80}}
